titleStmt.title: The country-mans fare-vvel to London. Or, A broad-side against pride

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.P. for J. Conniers, at the sign of the Black-Raven in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
At end of text: With allowance.
Verse - "Let's stem the Tide, though vanity be grown,".
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library; William Andrews Clark Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Black-Raven in Duck-lane
